title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Interactive Design for Real-Time Remote Mathematics Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers via real-time video tools to present math problem-solving strategies three or more times.
Learners can visualize and explain mathematical concepts using online whiteboards and collaboration tools.
Learners can improve draft math projects two or more times by incorporating peer feedback from asynchronous discussion platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
